# Youtube

[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com) is a popular online video sharing and social media platform.

## Options

| Option | Description | Required | Default |
| :----- | :---------- | :------- | :------ |
| id     | Video ID    | Yes      | - -     |

## Example

<!-- embed ignore begin -->

```text
{% embed youtube id="DyTCOwB0DVw" %}
```

<!-- embed ignore end -->

{% embed youtube id="DyTCOwB0DVw" %}
